item.title: Pesky pests
item.description: Hello from sunny Leeds! Yes, more sunshine has been sent. Today has been really warm and the bank holiday weather was good for the plants. Note: I compress the images for the web, but Iâ€™ve noticed the quality is pretty naff and they go all blurred. Will look into improving these in the future. To begin, I will start with the ongoing experiment. The conclusion is: chili seeds do not like to germinate!
